quest.name: My First Cross-pein Hammer
journal: Forgemaster Brithael wishes to see how well you can handle your new hammer.

As a firm believer in hands-on education, Brithael has instructed you to smelt bronze, an alloy of tin and copper. The requisite ore can be purchased from Smydhaemr, the guild supplier, but the essential fire shard will have to be obtained elsewhere. Craft a single bronze ingot and deliver it to Brithael.

Brithael is reasonably impressed by the quality of your bronze and declares that you have a gift for the craft. However, he stresses that no amount of talent can make up for a lack of experience, and asks that you return for further training only after the fundamentals have become second nature to you.

※The next blacksmith quest will be available from Brithael upon reaching level 5.
objectives: Deliver a bronze ingot to Brithael.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Now, that there is a beautiful sight... Never forget─a smitty's hammer is herhis one true love. Friends'll betray ye, lovers'll leave ye, but yer hammer'll never do ye no wrong.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Gods, seein' ye standin' there reminds me of a less ale-sodden, more lady-shapedale-sodden version o' me younger self...

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: But on to yer task! We ain't a congregation o' soft-handed scholarlies here. Smitties learn by doin'!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Try yer hand at makin' a bronze ingot. Any smitty worth herhis salt's got to master the fundamentals, an' ye can't get more fundamental than that!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: It ain't complicated─bronze is jus' copper an' tin melted down an' mixed together.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: So ye'll be needin'...? Aye, that's it! Copper an' tin ore. An' seein' as most folk don't carry stuff like that 'round with 'em without reason, Smydhaemr outside can provide ye with some─fer a price, that is.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: What the lad can't sell ye, though, is the fire shard ye'll need.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Aye─it ain't complicated, but that don't mean it's easy. Ye need to melt the metals, after all, an' to do that ye need to get 'em hotter than a Bombard's backsidea flame-kissed whore's crotch.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: An' that's all there is to it! Think ye can handle it, lasslad?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To synthesize a bronze ingot for Forgemaster Brithael, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Remember, to make a bronze ingot, all ye need is copper, tin, an' a fire shard. Smydhaemr can sell ye the ore, but ye'll have to find the shard on yer own. 'Course, I'm tellin' ye this on the assumption that ye've still to do the job. If ye've done it already, show us yer work fer gods' sakes!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Heh heh...yer all right, lasslad.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Better than that, even. Sure you ain't done this before?

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: 'Cause honestly, this ain't what ye'd expect from a 'venturer fresh off the street.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: I think ye might be a bleedin' natural, lasslad!

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: It takes jus' the right balance o' metals to produce bronze suitable fer weapons an' tools.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: But this ingot ye've made me, lasslad, it's on a par with them as our veterans produce. Ye could take this down to Hawkers' Alley and find a buyer in no time.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Byregot's watchin' over ye, ain't no doubt about it.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: Heh heh...ye've got talent, lasslad─but don't let it go to yer head.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: I've seen plenty o' folk get drunk on early success, only to puke their guts up later 'cause they forgot that talent's worth bugger all without hard work an' dedication.

dialogue.name: BRITHAEL
dialogue.text: So I tell ye what: keep it simple fer now, lasslad. Practice the fundamentals till ye can smelt bronze in yer sleep. An' when ye've gained the kind o' confidence as only comes with experience, come back an' I'll teach ye somethin' new.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next blacksmith quest will be available from Brithael upon reaching level 5.
